titleStmt.title: The Protestant mask taken off from the Jesuited Englishman being an answer to a book entituled Great Britain's just complaint.
titleStmt.author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Wilde for Robert Clavel ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Comber. cf. NUC pre-1956.
